Package net.royalur.model.state

Class RolledGameState<P extends Piece,​S extends PlayerState,​R extends Roll>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.royalur.model.GameState<P,​S,​R>
      • net.royalur.model.state.OngoingGameState<P,​S,​R>
        • net.royalur.model.state.ActionGameState<P,​S,​R>
          • net.royalur.model.state.RolledGameState<P,​S,​R>
  • Type Parameters:
    P - The type of pieces that are stored on the board in this game state.
    S - The type of state that is stored for each player.
    R - The type of roll that was made in this game state.
    public class RolledGameState<P extends Piece,​S extends PlayerState,​R extends Roll>
extends ActionGameState<P,​S,​R>
    A game state that represents a roll that was made in a game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RolledGameState

        public RolledGameState​(@Nonnull
                       Board<P> board,
                       @Nonnull
                       S lightPlayer,
                       @Nonnull
                       S darkPlayer,
                       @Nonnull
                       Player turn,
                       @Nonnull
                       R roll)
        Instantiates a game state that represents a roll that was made in a game.
        Parameters:
        board - The state of the pieces on the board.
        lightPlayer - The state of the light player.
        darkPlayer - The state of the dark player.
        turn - The player who can roll the dice.
        roll - The value of the dice that was rolled that can be used as the number of places to move a piece.
